A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie receives way too much hatred from what it deserves\, in fact it gets the most undeserved hatred from fans out of all the Star Wars movies since the prequels. The movie isn't bad\, but it's not great either. It's definitely one of the weaker Star Wars movies and it may have it's faults\, but I still think the movie's alright. Underrated by audiences and overrated by critics. Overall\, this movie was fine.
